title: Bce, depositi o/n in rialzo a 702,698 mld euro, prestiti a 2 mln Societ√† Estere
text: FRANKFURT, Jan 10 (Reuters) - The European Central Bank reported the following daily data on liquidity provision, in millions of euros.
